data.text: Not sure about Kanye being the face of bipolar disorder in popular culture now. He refuses treatment and 'embraces' the instability of the disorder. I guess Stephen Fry swore off meds too before a suicide attempt changed how he approached the condition.

Called it. Kanye West's new album is all about his bipolar diagnosis. Fucking sad his wife Kim Kardashian-West played down all the concerns people had of the clear signs. She must've known what was in his album. I sincerely hope he gets help.
Not one to judge usually, but psychiatrists don't prescribe 7 drugs just for fun. I'm sure when Kanye becomes too unstable or crashes hard his family will realise.

https://t.co/TQOzExTbqT

Sad his family are in denial. Kanye is clearly mentally unwell. The stuff he says in that TMZ episode are way beyond 'expressive'.
Fuck TMZ for airing this instead of getting him help. He's clearly unwell and this interview is doing nothing except embarrassing the shit out of Kanye and distressing the hell out of his family.

Cant control thoughts, experiencing a ridiculous amount of emotions, talking about the universe telling him to do shit, saying 'profound' stuff that is actually him just grabbing things from his immediate surroundings (posters on the wall) and saying it relates to him. All mania.
